dialog.d3: The trouble is that you fell, they did like the piper who brought all the rats in the lake and he drowned them.
dialog.d5: And I must go to give money to niggers?!! GIVE ME THE BAT!!!
dialog.d6: Don't say it to others, but I have a poster of Pope Galeazzo in my bedroom.
dialog.d7: The next year I'm going to buy a monkey costume by Ammazzon

dialog.d3: Excel improves continuously, like the registry.
dialog.d4: When I was a child, I had a cat. I called it "Scratch". What an interesting coincidence.
dialog.d6: The result of the algorithm showed a massive anomaly in the timespace continuum.
dialog.d7: One question that many people ask me is: "But when you think, think also with the french R"? The answer is simple: I don't think. I act.
